## append variable

Returns a new list containing the contents of the given list, followed by the given value

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
append: <T, U>(val: T, list: U[]) => (T | U)[]
```

## Example


```ts
append('Tom', ['hello']) // ['hello', 'Tom']
append('Tom', []) // ['Tom']
append(['Tom'], ['hello', 'world']) // ['hello', 'world', ['Tom']]

```
